--- product_code: ls12 description: 10mm German Statischer Mörsers (Static Mortars) title: 10mm German Statischer Mörsers (Static Mortars) breadcrumb: Statischer Mörsers (Static Mortars) name: German Statischer Mörsers (Static Mortars) cost: $12.00 paypal_id: 7V9ZRJ97A5HFC ---

Mortars were used in sieges, firing out of sappe (pits) for protection where they lobbed shells up and over fortress walls.

This is a Statischer Mörsers (Static Mortars) unit of two static mortars and six crew. You will recieve two mortar barrels (ls_d), two mortar cradles (ls12a) and five crew (one ls_e and mix of four ls15a–i).
